Welcome to Amsterdam!
Starting off as a tourist in Amsterdam, you sense there is something in the air! Once settled in your hotel room, more and more mysteries reveal. Explore the city by combining clues and solving puzzles. You have no choice but use all the knowledge and wisdom you may find during your exploration. Passing by the most famous places in Amsterdam, like the Rijksmuseum, the Flower Market and the Carré Theatre, you will solve the mysteries that finally lead you to the greatest diamond you have ever seen!

The curse of the Amsterdam diamond has all the ingredients an hidden object adventure could wish for. An eagles eye and common sense will lead you through an exciting adventure in the beautiful city of Amsterdam. Hidden clues and tools will provide you enough rope to hold on to and the amazing design will make your heart beat just a little bit faster.

Features of the full version:
• 19 Hidden Object sceneries
• 13 Minipuzzles and 6 Hidden Object puzzles
• Realistic and stunning 3d art
• Thrilling storyline
• Lots of plots and twists
• An historical Dutch backdrop
• The heart and soul of suspense
• Amazing sceneries and…
• Unprecedented guidance tour through Amsterdam.
